item.title: [HIVE-27495] NPE when trying to transform using clause to on clause
item.description:
To reproduce, run the following:

create table test (
 id int
);

select * from test t1
join test t2 using(id)
join test t3 using(id);

This will fail with:

The root cause of the issue is that for the second join, leftTableAlias is null here.

For the first join, we have both t1 and t2, but for the second join, the left side is a join token, and it doesn't get assigned a table alias, i.e., leftTableAlias is null. And it fails while creating the left AST - it creates a malformed tree <<(. (tok_table_or_col >>.
